meanings.definition: The state or condition of being stunted in growth or development.
meanings.sent1: The stuntednesses of the plant were evident in its small size.
meanings.sent2: The stuntednesses of the child's growth concerned the parents.
meanings.sent3: The stuntednesses of the tree made it look like a tiny bonsai.
meanings.sent4: The stuntednesses of progress in the project hindered its success.
meanings.sent5: The stuntednesses of the economy were felt by all citizens.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being stunted in growth or development.
meanings.sent1: The stuntednesses of the flower's petals were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The stuntednesses of his intellect were apparent in his speech.
meanings.sent3: The stuntednesses of the puppy's tail wag made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The stuntednesses of her creativity blossomed unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The stuntednesses of the building's design left much to be desired.
